definitions.description: Information on a generic insurable item. Insured cars and Homes have specialized tables. The model can be extended by adding other specialized Insured Asset tables.

constantValues: Information on a generic insurable item. Insured cars and Homes have specialized tables. The model can be extended by adding other specialized Insured Asset tables.

members.name: insuredgenericassetId
members.description: The ID of the insured customer asset.

constantValues: The ID of the insured customer asset.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the Insured Asset

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'InsuredGenericAsset' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Insured Asset

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'InsuredGenericAsset' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Insured Asset

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: Required name field.

members.name: assetdescription
members.description: The description of the asset insured under the Policy.

constantValues: The description of the asset insured under the Policy.

members.name: assettype
members.description: The type of asset insured, these include vehicle, property, other.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'assettype_display' is added to the 'InsuredGenericAsset' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'assettype'
supportingAttribute.name: assettype_display

constantValues: The type of asset insured, these include vehicle, property, other.

members.name: coverage
members.description: Reference to the Coverage of the generic asset.

constantValues: Reference to the Coverage of the generic asset.

members.name: description
members.description: Location description of the property insured under this Policy.

constantValues: Location description of the property insured under this Policy.

members.name: fairmarketvalue
members.description: The estimated current value of the asset when the Policy was issued.

constantValues: The estimated current value of the asset when the Policy was issued.

members.name: fairmarketvalue_Base
members.description: Value of the fair market value in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the fair market value in base currency.

members.name: lienholders
members.description: The lienholder who has ownership rights on the asset.

constantValues: The lienholder who has ownership rights on the asset.

members.name: postalcode
members.description: Zip/Postal Code of the property insured.

constantValues: Zip/Postal Code of the property insured.

members.name: primaryowner
members.description: ID of the primary owner of the asset.

constantValues: ID of the primary owner of the asset.

members.name: propertyimprovements
members.description: Description of any property improvements.

members.description: The condition rating of the insured property.

supportingAttribute.name: propertyrating_display

members.name: propertyusage
members.description: The manner the property is used by the Policy holder such as owner or rented out.

members.description: The price paid by the customer for the Insured Asset.

constantValues: The price paid by the customer for the Insured Asset.

members.description: Value of the Purchase Amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the Purchase Amount in base currency.

members.description: Generic asset valid start date.
